definition: smiling wholeheartedly (idiom); beaming from ear to ear

sentences.english: Candy's face reddens, but she manages to force a smile.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂的脸涨红，却强挤出了一丝笑容。

sentences.english: You know who's the reason for this big smile on my face?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我脸上绽露出的笑容，原因是什么吗？

sentences.english: I thought it would raise a smile with people at the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 我想它能给前来参观展览的人带来笑容。

sentences.english: Even if the whole universe are black, I would also like to use my face around to kindle.
sentences.chinese: 就算全宇宙都是黑色的，我也要用我的笑容燃亮四周。

sentences.english: " The second most common question is, "What the fuck is a C-shaped smile?
sentences.chinese: 另外一个是“他妈的什么是C型笑容”。

sentences.english: Nancy was all smiles when she saw Tom.
sentences.chinese: 南希一见汤姆就满面笑容。

sentences.english: She became so happy and smiled, saying 'I'll take it right now.'
sentences.chinese: 她非常高兴，笑容满面，说道‘我现在就卖。’

sentences.english: In the perspective of subordinates, has also not condemning mouth, and you would like to smile out of him?
sentences.chinese: 在下属的角度，已经骂不还口了，你还想他挤出笑容？

sentences.english: Let life shine with a smile, for the life of a surging tide night.
sentences.chinese: 让生活绽放一次笑容，让生命磅礴一次潮夕。
他的笑容掩饰他的愤怒情绪。

sentences.english: Jihoo is so happy to see Jandi's brilliant smile when she can get the "meat" prize!
sentences.chinese: 智厚很幸福看丝草明朗笑容，她获得肉奖品的时候。

sentences.english: When I got there she smiled again, and handed me a boarding pass.
sentences.chinese: 在柜台前她笑容满面地递给我一张登机牌。

sentences.english: But in the end, Yang's laughs will surely drown out those of his keyboard warrior critics.
sentences.chinese: 但是在最后，孙杨的笑容势必会盖过键盘侠们的口水。

sentences.english: I remember the laughers and tears in your face.
sentences.chinese: 我记得你脸上的笑容或是眼泪。

sentences.english: Never frow even when you are sad because you never know who is falling in love with you smile.
sentences.chinese: 永远不要皱着眉头，因为你不知道谁会爱上你的笑容。

sentences.english: Fitness undulated in the face of people happy smile.
sentences.chinese: 健身的人们脸上荡漾着快乐的笑容。

definition: expression or emotion showing in one's eyes/meaningful glance/wink/eyesight (dialect)
